body:
We didn't want to add `cffi` to `requirements.txt`, because it's necessary only for this single module, which will be probably used only by a relatively small subset of users. We'll emphasise this requirement in the docs.

No, `pytorch` depends only on `pyyaml`, and it's a build-time dependency (for `cwrap`, a tool for generating wrappers for TH(C) and TH(CU)NN functions). We have no run-time dependencies, except for `cffi` if you want to use `torch.utils.ffi`.
